title: Sealed Classes for Weather States
description: Create a sealed class hierarchy for weather conditions and a function to get weather advice.
instructions:
1. Create a sealed class `Weather` with subclasses: Sunny (temperature), Rainy (intensity), Snowy (inches)
2. Create a function `getAdvice(Weather weather)` using exhaustive switch
3. Return appropriate advice for each weather type

testCases.expectedOutput: Nice day (85 F)! Perfect for outdoor activities.
Heavy rain! Stay indoors or bring an umbrella.
Heavy snow (12 inches)! Roads may be dangerous.

hints.text: Use 'sealed class' to define the base class
Subclasses use 'extends' just like regular inheritance
Destructure properties in switch cases: Sunny(temperature: var temp)

commonMistakes.mistake: Adding a default case to sealed class switch
commonMistakes.consequence: Defeats the purpose of exhaustive checking
Compiler error due to non-exhaustive switch
commonMistakes.correction: Add cases for all subclasses of the sealed class
